code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Swal from"sweetalert2";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Footer from"../components/Footer";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ForgotPassword=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleReset=e=>{e.preventDefault();const users=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("users"))||[];const user=users.find(u=>u.email===email);if(!user){Swal.fire("Email Not Found!","Please enter a registered email.","error");return;}Swal.fire("Reset Link Sent!","A password reset link has been sent to your email (demo).","success");navigate("/reset-password",{state:{email}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex flex-col justify-between \r bg-gradient-to-br from-[#1A2F4D] to-[#1A2F4D] \r pt-28 pb-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-full px-4 pt-28 pb-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white\\ shadow-lg p-8 rounded-xl w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-center mb-2 text-white",children:"Forgot Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleReset,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter your registered email",className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded-lg",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-blue-600 text-white py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition",children:"Send Reset Link"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{onClick:()=>navigate("/login"),className:"text-center text-sm mt-4 text-blue-600 cursor-pointer hover:underline",children:"Back to Login"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default ForgotPassword;
